scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/demo/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/demo
  set jcr:title{String} to "Demo"
end
create service user demo-service-user with path /home/users/system/demo

set ACL for demo-service-user
	allow jcr:read on /apps
	allow jcr:read,rep:write on /etc/clientlibs
	allow jcr:read on /content
end
